function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate space for physical distancing in communal areas of apartment buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and reduced quality of life for residents","Mitigation":"Implement minimum size requirements for communal areas and retrofit existing spaces to allow for adequate physical distancing","Technologies":"Smart building design and layout tools for optimizing communal spaces","People":"Residents, building managers, and architects","Owner":"Architects and building managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and daylighting in apartment units","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and lack of natural light, impacting resident health and well-being","Mitigation":"Design apartment units with ample windows, cross-ventilation, and access to natural light","Technologies":"Passive solar design, natural ventilation strategies, and daylighting modeling tools","People":"Architects, developers, and residents","Owner":"Developers and architects"},{"Description":"Reliance on elevators in high-rise residential buildings","Impact":"Limited accessibility and mobility during power outages or emergencies, increasing the risk to residents' safety and well-being","Mitigation":"Design buildings with stairwell access, backup power for elevators, and accessible spaces for residents with mobility challenges","Technologies":"Emergency backup power systems, accessible design tools, and smart building technologies for emergency response","People":"Architects, building managers, and residents","Owner":"Building developers and managers"}]}
